title: Visma-Lease a Bike Sketches out Masterplan for Continued WorldTour Dominance in 2024
content:
New-look jerseys and some wild new programs confirmed by team at media event as it looks to repeat historic 2023 season.

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike Sketches out Masterplan for Continued WorldTour Dominance in 2024 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
